question:
Which of the following sites are listed in UNESCO World Heritage list?
  1. Nalanda Mahavihara
  2. Khangchendzonga National Park
  3. Great Himalayan National Park
 Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Great Himalayan National Park is located in Kullu, Himachal Pradesh. It was included in the UNESCO World Heritage List in 2014. The Nalanda Mahavihara site is located in Bihar. It was included in the list of UNESCO World Heritage sites in 2016. Khangchendzonga National Park is located in Sikkim. It was included in the UNESCO World Heritage List in 2016.
